name: Knights of Loose Change
description: Upon use, immediately heals a target ally for 45% of their Max HP.
story:
A souvenir that {NICKNAME} sells on {TEXTJOIN#87}. The inspiration came from a certain fan's fanwork. Every time {NICKNAME} thinks of the support and love {F#she}{M#he} gets from others, {F#she}{M#he} gets warm on the inside.

"The character in the illustration is the Express' number one assassin. Do you dare to meet {F#her}{M#his} gaze for 10 seconds?"
